title: Simplytics Analytics Platform
excerpt: Live REST API and web dashboard for real-time analytics. Coming soon.
description:
Status: In active development.

Simplytics delivers a unified analytics layer with a production-grade REST API and responsive dashboard so teams can explore their data without spinning up custom tooling. The MVP focuses on high-signal metrics, granular filtering, and an opinionated permissions model built for client engagements.

Current work includes finalizing the ingest pipeline, polishing the dashboard UX, and wrapping the API with robust observability. A detailed case study and public demo will ship alongside the beta release.
